game.name: FIRE The First Dreamer
game.categories: Single-player, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Uncover ancient secrets, summon totemic magic, decode enigmatic messages, and explore the majestic Preseli mountains of Wales in this open world adventure inspired by a true story. Dare to embark on this journey and rediscover the lost secrets of a life lived with purpose and meaning!
